description: A list of flavored tobacco products that may not be sold within 500 feet of a school in Chicago.  See http://www.cityofchicago.org/health/tobacco for the specifics of the regulation.  This list will be updated at the beginning of March, June, September, and December, each year.

See http://www.cityofchicago.org/health/tobacco for the specifics of the regulation.  This list will be updated at the beginning of March, June, September, and December, each year.

name: Restricted Flavored Tobacco Products
